Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.gui.util

Class BoardPane

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.gui.util.BoardPane
public class BoardPane extends Object
BoardPane represents the pane in which golden/resource decks and face up cards resides, along with common objective cards
